cult Primary
		                    Treatment of recurrent metastatic squamous neck cancer with occult primary is usually within a clinical trial.    Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with recurrent metastatic squamous neck cancer with occult primary. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug. Talk with your doctor about clinical
